title: 280: Time to trade Odell Beckham Jr?
itunes:title: 280: Time to trade Odell Beckham Jr?
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks dive into a scenario where the Giants would trade Odell Beckham to the Browns and debate which franchise would come out on top (1:31). The guys also buy stock in a few players racing up draft boards (15:15) before they highlight the 2018 tight end class (30:13). DJ and Bucky wrap the show by playing "Prospect Roulette" and pick quarterback prospects that would succeed in certain football scenarios (39:31).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
